item.title: Pure Storage Product comparison
item.description: This is a quick post to compare the releases of some Pure Storage products which I’ve been using over the past couple of months now. I have to say I was very impressed with the towel 1.0 release, excellent capacity and coverage, a smooth side and a rough side, the well known Pure orange colour prominent throughout. At some 160 x 100 cm, there’s coverage for even the most, shall we say, ‘demanding’ IT Professional.
